title: Italian Riviera Glamour near San Marino with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch & Nightly Drinks
description:
Step back into 1950s glamour at this boutique gem on Italy's Marche coast. With 52 rooms that scream elegance, a spa that will have you floating on air, two restaurants to suit your every mood and a private Lido Beach Club - the only one of its kind along this stretch of the Adriatic - you've officially hit the holiday jackpot.

Sprawl out on plush sunloungers under chic umbrellas and quench your thirst without leaving the sand for that full VIP vibe. Melt your cares away in one of two heated whirlpool tubs, then swing by Bistr√≤ restaurant where authentic Marche cuisine will blow you away with every mouthwatering bite.

Between the nautical eye candy, the chill colour palette and massive windows framing ever-changing Mediterranean views, this hotel is your ticket to the good life, where style and privacy reign supreme.
